title.native: 七つの大罪 黙示録の四騎士 第2期
title.romaji: Nanatsu no Taizai: Mokushiroku no Yonkishi 2nd Season
title.english: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse Season 2

description: The second season of Nanatsu no Taizai: Mokushiroku no Yonkishi.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Super Robot
tags.description: Prominently features large robots often piloted by hot-blooded protagonists.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

title.native: 七つの大罪 黙示録の四騎士

name.native: アーサー・ペンドラゴン
トリスタン・リオネス
エリザベス・リオネス
マーガレット・リオネス

node.description:
[Blog](http://blog.livedoor.jp/suzukinakaba/)

Japanese manga artist who has published works in Weekly Shounen Jump, Weekly Shounen Sunday, and Weekly Shounen Magazine.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kohta_yamabook) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yamabook_kohta/) | [Website](https://www.kohtayamamoto.net/)

Formerly affiliated with Legendoor, he is now in business partnership with VV-ALKLINE.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/2894227226) | [Tumblr](https://henrythurlow.tumblr.com/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/HTAnimations) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/HenryThurlowAnimator)

Formerly affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/) between 2021 and 2024.

Graduated Pratt Institute with a Bachelor in Fine Arts in Animation in 2006.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/2894227226) | [Tumblr](https://henrythurlow.tumblr.com/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/HTAnimations) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/HenryThurlowAnimator)

Formerly affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/) between 2021 and 2024.

Graduated Pratt Institute with a Bachelor in Fine Arts in Animation in 2006.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/2894227226) | [Tumblr](https://henrythurlow.tumblr.com/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/HTAnimations) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/HenryThurlowAnimator)

Formerly affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/) between 2021 and 2024.

Graduated Pratt Institute with a Bachelor in Fine Arts in Animation in 2006.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/2800207636) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/olecloken/)

Norwegian freelance traditional animator with deep ties to the western animation industry.

Graduated from The Animation Workshop in Viborg, Denmark with a Bachelor in Animation and Character Design in 2013.

__Notable works outside anime:__
~!
- Fixed (Film, Upcoming) (Animator)
- Green Eggs and Ham (TV Series, 2022) (Animator)
- Space Jam: A New Legacy (Film, 2021) (Animator: Tonic DNA)
- Klaus (Film, 2019) (Senior Animator) 
- The Breadwinner (Film, 2017) (Animator)
- Song of the Sea (Film, 2014) (Animator)!~
